sentence.Network_en: In the art world after the 1960 s, Postmodernism becomes the dominant ideology.

sentence.Network_en: The influence of postmodernism has shifted from humanistic disciplines to natural disciplines.
sentence.Network_cn: 后现代主义的影响已从人文学科转到自然学科.

entry.tran: 后现代主义（20世纪后期艺术、建筑、文学领域的一种流派，通常以讽刺的手法将风格、观点、指代对象与现代社会揉为一体）
entry.def: Post-modernism is a late twentieth century approach in art, architecture, and literature which typically mixes styles, ideas, and references to modern society, often in an ironic way.

means.word_mean: 1. genre of art and literature and especially architecture in reaction against principles and practices of established modernism
